"Thanks go to BlackyHawky and their contributors for indirectly providing motivation to implement autosizing of the RomanDigital app widget text; this was provided by observation of the digital clock widget text autosizing in their excellent Clock app (https://github.com/BlackyHawky/Clock). Seeing the app's widget convinced me that such autosizing could actually be done.
The BlackyHawky Clock source code is unfortunately licensed under GNU GPL v3.0 which is incompatible with RomanDigital's Apache 2.0 license without relicensing RomanDigital. Consequently, to avoid potential legal entanglements, the BlackyHawky Clock source code was neither copied nor reviewed in development of the RomanDigital app widget."
